variables.name: description
values: "Ports 22, 80 and 443 are open in this Security Group"

variables.name: user_data
values:
<<-EOF #! bin/bash sudo apt update -y sudo apt install git -y sudo apt install snapd -y sudo snap install core -y sudo snap refresh core sudo snap install --classic certbot sudo ln -s /snap/bin/certbot /usr/bin/certbot sudo certbot --apache -d spot.parser3.com sudo apt install apache2 -y sudo systemctl apache2 start sudo bash -c 'echo "

deployed by Jay using Terraform

" >> /var/www/html/index.html' sudo bash -c 'echo "

In ca-central-1d Subnet in Canada

" >> /var/www/html/index.html' date >> /var/www/html/index.html sudo echo "alias ll='ls -alF'" >> /home/admin/.bashrc EOF

file:
# Jay Fallah, Parsedata Jan 2022 # Creating a Development to have a playground programmatically in chosen cloud # 1. Create VPC # 2. Create an Internet Gateway # 3. Create a Custom Route Table # 4. Create a Subnet # 5. Associate this Subnet with the Route Table # 6. Create a Security Group to allow SSH, HTTP, HTTPS on ports 22, 80 and 443 # 7. Create a Network Interface with ip in the Subnet # 8. Associate an Elasic IP to the Network # 9. Create a Debian Server EC2 Spot Instance and install basic programs # 10. Add Route 53 DNS record to access the spot server # Paramaterize all the above steps and test to see if it works as specified provider "aws" { region = ^region.hthn9jww^ access_key = ^access_key.2r15cm4q^ secret_key = ^secret_key.6rub1974^ default_tags { tags = ^tags.8bfls0tf^ } } # 1. Creates VPC in the specified cloud (AWS) resource "aws_vpc" "spotvpc" { cidr_block = ^cidr_block.hw3jwciv^ enable_dns_hostnames = ^enable_dns_hostnames.j14sleqa^ enable_dns_support = ^enable_dns_support.ew5p3a6f^ tags = ^tags.eokxqnf2^ } # 2. Creates an Internet Gateway for the VPC in the AWS "spotvpc" resource "aws_internet_gateway" "spotgw" { vpc_id = ^vpc_id.8nxq9b3f^ tags = ^tags.1lxxctrm^ } # 3. Creates a Custom Route Table for the Network resource "aws_route_table" "spotroutetable" { vpc_id = ^vpc_id.irzp5l9a^ route { cidr_block = ^cidr_block.j1m2m7w9^ gateway_id = ^gateway_id.be6bsmfq^ } tags = ^tags.f95dex0p^ } # 4. Creates a Subnet in the Network resource "aws_subnet" "uno" { vpc_id = ^vpc_id.1wxwk22k^ cidr_block = ^cidr_block.6n8f8rnn^ availability_zone = ^availability_zone.8jw01cze^ tags = ^tags.ci1glvz^ } # 5. Associates Uno Subnet with Spot Route Table resource "aws_route_table_association" "subnet-association" { subnet_id = ^subnet_id.8x1j5pvy^ route_table_id = ^route_table_id.ivaej7vk^ } # 6. Creates a Security Group for testing with open ports on 22, 80 and 443 resource "aws_security_group" "spotsg" { name = ^name.6ky3agee^ description = ^description.2j74u7l^ vpc_id = ^vpc_id.iej0n5hs^ ingress { cidr_blocks = ^cidr_blocks.d42mv7pj^ description = ^description.3vbvod0m^ from_port = ^from_port.7j27y4de^ to_port = ^to_port.gp8gyau3^ protocol = ^protocol.ikkic71^ } ingress { cidr_blocks = ^cidr_blocks.bt8hsdi1^ description = ^description.730aieb0^ from_port = ^from_port.7p6f5wpa^ to_port = ^to_port.7a48rjmh^ protocol = ^protocol.kcadb4pn^ } ingress { cidr_blocks = ^cidr_blocks.birj2ll8^ description = ^description.h6qow10x^ from_port = ^from_port.eddtukzy^ to_port = ^to_port.blpljdzi^ protocol = ^protocol.6yb16cv4^ } egress { from_port = ^from_port.h12klq5e^ to_port = ^to_port.286z72x5^ protocol = ^protocol.jd26b139^ cidr_blocks = ^cidr_blocks.f1fmciu1^ } tags = ^tags.5oy11s22^ } # 7. Creates a Network Interface for Spot VPC resource "aws_network_interface" "spotnic" { subnet_id = ^subnet_id.cgy6cuq0^ private_ips = ^private_ips.40q2aeou^ security_groups = ^security_groups.hxqjxpjx^ tags = ^tags.3pevo2is^ } # 8. Associates an Elastic IP to the Network resource "aws_eip" "publicip" { vpc = ^vpc.1ejpolrb^ network_interface = ^network_interface.etjif6pm^ associate_with_private_ip = ^associate_with_private_ip.64he2r7p^ depends_on = ^depends_on.cdin4n9u^ tags = ^tags.ke3d77hr^ } # 9. Creates a Debian EC2 on Spot and associates a key for ssh logging resource "aws_spot_instance_request" "spotserver" { ami = ^ami.i8e9hz5k^ instance_type = ^instance_type.blq5av7x^ availability_zone = ^availability_zone.6hrgduxf^ key_name = ^key_name.f5ili728^ spot_price = ^spot_price.bc8psp83^ spot_type = ^spot_type.fp78xrsa^ wait_for_fulfillment = ^wait_for_fulfillment.cisz7umi^ tags = ^tags.8rv91oya^ network_interface { device_index = ^device_index.jfzsg7gy^ network_interface_id = ^network_interface_id.ghumdah5^ } user_data = ^user_data.7u42klgb^ #! bin/bash sudo apt update -y sudo apt install git -y sudo apt install snapd -y sudo snap install core -y sudo snap refresh core sudo snap install --classic certbot sudo ln -s /snap/bin/certbot /usr/bin/certbot sudo certbot --apache -d spot.parser3.com sudo apt install apache2 -y sudo systemctl apache2 start sudo bash -c 'echo "

deployed by Jay using Terraform

" >> /var/www/html/index.html' sudo bash -c 'echo "

In ca-central-1d Subnet in Canada

" >> /var/www/html/index.html' date >> /var/www/html/index.html sudo echo "alias ll='ls -alF'" >> /home/admin/.bashrc EOF #! bin/bash sudo apt update -y sudo apt install git -y sudo apt install snapd -y sudo snap install core -y sudo snap refresh core sudo snap install --classic certbot sudo ln -s /snap/bin/certbot /usr/bin/certbot sudo certbot --apache -d spot.parser3.com sudo apt install apache2 -y sudo systemctl apache2 start sudo bash -c 'echo "

deployed by Jay using Terraform

" >> /var/www/html/index.html' sudo bash -c 'echo "

In ca-central-1d Subnet in Canada

" >> /var/www/html/index.html' date >> /var/www/html/index.html sudo echo "alias ll='ls -alF'" >> /home/admin/.bashrc EOF } # Output parameters for the spot server output "spotip" { value = ^value.78vlpbfb^ } output "spotprivateip" { value = ^value.92u4gmig^ } output "publicdns" { value = ^value.d97neb7b^ } output "spotid" { value = ^value.1gx6pil5^ } # 10. Adds spot server that is created above to the correct zone from Route53 as spot.parser3.com data "aws_route53_zone" "selected" { name = ^name.e3at2eak^ private_zone = ^private_zone.g3rmxxvc^ } resource "aws_route53_record" "spot" { zone_id = ^zone_id.4dx693mv^ name = ^name.2vt6l6sg^ type = ^type.7s1w19mz^ ttl = ^ttl.4vsalrol^ records = ^records.a720i5b4^ }
